identification.title: Master's Student in Computer Engineering
identification.bio: I specialize in Software Engineering with a strong passion for the world of Web Development. My mission is to architect high-performance digital solutions that bridge the gap between complex backend logic and immersive user experiences.

timeline.title: MASTER'S IN SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
timeline.description: Focusing on advanced software engineering principles, modern web architectures, and scalable system design.

timeline.title: BACHELOR'S IN COMPUTER SCIENCE
timeline.description: Focused on high-performance algorithm design, system complexity, and software engineering foundations.
